Interrogator: Okay. So why was the woman screaming on the man?
Interrogee: Because he had puked near the place where she was sleeping, so she was really agitated by that behavior. Also, she wanted money. So that was the reason why she was screaming at the man.

Interrogator: Why was the man ignoring her?
Interrogee: Because he was listening to the radio, and the radio was announcing his favorite Comrade Crunch cereal advertisement.

Interrogator: So where did the man go after leaving his house and what was the reason?
Interrogee: So he went out to buy milk because he wanted to eat his favorite cereal Comrade Crunch, and he went to a store.

Interrogator: Okay, so what incident happened at the local store?
Interrogee: So there was this man in spectacles who had a knife and was threatening the shopkeeper for weapons. And the shopkeeper then said he doesn't have weapons, and then the shopkeeper said that he has money, and then this time, the man in spectacles started demanding for money. And the Russian man wanted to buy the milk as soon as possible. So he was poking the man in spectacles to do his job fast. But the man in spectacles was so irritated. So he turned his back to attack the Russian man, and the Russian man, like, shot him.

Interrogator: Okay, so what did the man see while he was going to the store?
Interrogee: He saw some crimes happening, robbery happening, I don't precisely remember what it really was.

Interrogator: Okay, so who did the man encounter when he got back to his home?
Interrogee: So there was this black man who was the girl's boyfriend, so he was there to demand money from the Russian man.

Interrogator: Okay, when the man shot the man in spectacle, what was the reaction of the store owner?
Interrogee: He was behaving as if it was normal.

Interrogator: So he was not scared or he was not trying to send the man away?
Interrogee: No, he was not trying to do anything.

Interrogator: Was the bill for the milk paid?
Interrogee: Yes, I guess I am not sure about it.

Interrogator: Okay, so what happened at the house when the man returned, the black man was there.
Interrogee: So the black man cursed the man's sister, that really agitated the Russian man. And so the Russian man attacked him. And before that, the black man had also attacked him several times and knocked him off. But the Russian just stood up and just then attacked him and like shot him.

Interrogator: So why was the black man angry?
Interrogee: Because he wanted money, and the Russian man was not giving him his money.

Interrogator: So who initiated the attack?
Interrogee: The Russian man initiated that attack. It was the Russian who just ran off to the black man and started attacking.

Interrogator: Why wasn't he the one who was not paying the money?
Interrogee: Yeah, but still he felt the need of attacking that man.

Interrogator: Was there any particular reason?
Interrogee: Also, the Russian men had cursed the black man's sister, the black men had cursed Russian man sister, so he really didn't like it. And also, also, the black man had spilled the milk of Russian man that he just bought. And then he remembered in the past, that his parents were also murdered. And all those flashbacks came into his mind.

Interrogator: Was the black man killed?
Interrogee: I guess so. I am not very sure.

Interrogator: So what was the reminisce that he has about his parents?
Interrogee: So he had a flashback of eating Comrade Crunchy with his mother. And then he had this flashback where he was coming from school and his parents were killed by two bald men, and one of them was eating his cereals. And then the other man said that we will only do the work that we were paid for and not to harm the child and Russian man as a child had to witness someone killing their parents.

Interrogator: What happened with those two bald men who killed Russian man's parents?
Interrogee: Russian man after growing up, joined the gang of those bald men and then killed them, all of them.

Interrogator: So, what happened after the black man was knocked down by the Russian man? What did the Russian man do after that?
Interrogee: Russian man went to the store again as the black man had spilled his milk? So he went again to buy some milk.

Interrogator: Okay, so what did the man who was there at the store when the Russian came to the shop the second time?
Interrogee: So are you talking about the shopkeeper?

Interrogator: Who else were there other than the shopkeeper?
Interrogee: Two policemen were there. In the police car there was this man in spectacles. Who the Russian man attacked before and the policemen were inquiring about who had attacked the man in spectacles and if he was wearing a turban, but the shopkeeper tried to tell him that no a six-foot Russian guy had attacked the spectacle. And then the shopkeeper saw the same Russian in the store and then signaled to the police officer.

Interrogator: Okay, so why did the police start shooting at the man?
Interrogee: Because the Russian man started attacking the policeman.

Interrogator: Okay, so Well, what did the Russian man see while he was going to the store the second time?
Interrogee: I don't remember.

Interrogator: So what happened at the end?
Interrogee: So the Russian man was killed by the police officer. And then at the end, he ate some cereal and drank some milk before he died.

Interrogator: Were any police officers injured or killed during all this?
Interrogee: Yes, the Russian man and the police officer were both injured.

Interrogator: What kind of injuries did you observe?
Interrogee: I don't remember.
